DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety INCB054828 subject myeloid/lymphoid neoplasms fibroblast growth factor receptor ( FGFR ) 1 rearrangement .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety INCB054828 Subjects With Myeloid/Lymphoid Neoplasms With FGFR1 Rearrangement
DOC.criteria: Documented lymphoid myeloid neoplasm 8p11 rearrangement know lead FGFR1 activation , base standard diagnostic cytogenetic evaluation perform locally , sign inform consent study .
